name: Neruvia
description:
Description 

Something sinister threatens your kingdom and the magical creatures in it. But will you, the Princess, be able to find the culprit and save Neruvia? 

Neruvia is a visual novel mystery romance, from the perspective of you, the princess, as you meet various characters and form close bonds with some in hopes of uncovering the culprit and bringing peace back to your kingdom.

Characters

MC - You, The Princess. You might be a bit headstrong, but your heart is true and you will stop at nothing to save your kingdom.

Valen - Your loyal knight, whose only wish is to have things go back to the way they were.

Aladar  - A mysterious man of the night who seldom wishes to share his story. Maybe there is more to him than meets the eye.

Pandora - An immortal, powerful witch who has lost her powers. Perhaps she has lost more than that?

??? - An entity of great importance to you. 

Features

Even though this build is only a DEMO, we still wanted to provide with a lovely experience and an idea what to expect in the future! Features in this Build:

  • ~ 7k words
  • One special scene and multiple CGs
  • Original scores by V
  • Gallery

What we plan for full version:

  • Fleshed out romances and stories for each of the characters
  • Bringing the characters to life with different poses and more facial expressions.
  • Custom CGs and special scenes obtainable on certain routes
  • We plan on continuing building on our original score 
  • Secret routes unlocked after completing the main romance routes
  • ~10 endings (including Good and Bad endings)
  • The ability to play on Android
  • ...and much more ;)

DISCLAIMER Certain elements even in the demo might not be suitable for those under 13.
